values: 显露，揭露；展现，显示
To reveal is to show something.
I will reveal where I hid the candy bar.

暴露， 揭露； 展现
To reveal is to make something known or to uncover or disclose something that was previously hidden or secret.
Reveal means to make something known or visible that was previously concealed or hidden.
